channel.title: Consumer Confidence on FinanClub

item.title: FNMA
item.description: score:-67 Chances: Shares of FNMA, also known as Fannie Mae, have surged approximately 68% year-to-date, showing significant positive momentum in the market. Fannie Mae’s efforts to reduce the size of its retained mortgage portfolio, including the sale of non-performing loans and reperforming loans, indicate the company’s commitment to managing its mortgage assets.
